ygData.subject: RE: Info for Bards from Patch Message.
ygData.msgSnippet: My guess is Erudin.  Didn t the erudites sail to Erudin when they left the rest of humanity ?  Also, the patch message mentions Abandon your mates, though
ygData.messageBody:
My guess is Erudin. Didn't the erudites sail to Erudin when they left the
rest of "humanity"? Also, the patch message mentions "Abandon your mates,
though they may fume" probably means to go to Erudin since nobody else
does... hehe
